abstract: traders sell vanguard total international stock etf on strength .
article: investors sold shares of vanguard total international stock etf on strength during trading hours on monday . $ 35.07 million flowed into the stock on the tick-up and $ 146.27 million flowed out of the stock on the tick-down , for a money net flow of $ 111.20 million out of the stock . of all equities tracked , vanguard total international stock etf had the 8th highest net out-flow for the day . vanguard total international stock etf traded up $ 0.33 for the day and closed at $ 60.29 the business also recently disclosed a quarterly dividend , which was paid on wednesday , december 27th .

shareholders of record on friday , december 22nd were issued a dividend of $ 0.539 per share . the ex-dividend date of this dividend was thursday , december 21st . this represents a $ 2.16 dividend on an annualized basis and a dividend yield of 3.58 % . several hedge funds and other institutional investors have recently modified their holdings of the business . citigroup inc. . lifted its holdings in shares of vanguard total international stock etf by 4.2 % during the second quarter . citigroup inc. . now owns 9,745 shares of the company 's stock valued at $ 506,000 after acquiring an additional 397 shares during the period .

wfg advisors lp lifted its holdings in shares of vanguard total international stock etf by 1.8 % during the second quarter . wfg advisors lp now owns 23,246 shares of the company 's stock valued at $ 1,208,000 after acquiring an additional 417 shares during the period . ftb advisors inc. . lifted its holdings in shares of vanguard total international stock etf by 3.6 % during the second quarter . ftb advisors inc. . now owns 13,149 shares of the company 's stock valued at $ 706,000 after acquiring an additional 453 shares during the period . hall laurie j trustee lifted its holdings in shares of vanguard total international stock etf by 3.4 % during the second quarter .
